QuestData.Title: A Pearl of Wisdom
QuestData.Description: This pearl is unlike anything you've ever seen before. It radiates light, and if you are not mistaken, it radiates powerful magic as well.$B$BEarthmender Duarn back in Silver Tide Hollow will surely be interested in this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Luminescent Pearl to Earthmender Duarn in Silvertide Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: What is this? A pearl? Much more I think.$B$BThis is exactly what I was looking for, thank you for bringing it to me.
